pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Inpost PythonFully async Inpost library using Python 3.10.## Documentation[Readthedocs.io](https://inpost-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)## Usage/Examples```pythonfrom inpost.api import Inpostinp = await Inpost.from_phone_number('555333444')await inp.send_sms_code():...if await inp.confirm_sms_code(123321): print('Congratulations, you initialized successfully!')```## Authors- [@loboda4450](https://www.github.com/loboda4450)- [@mrkazik99](https://www.github.com/mrkazik99)## Used ByThis project is used by the following repos:[Inpost Telegram Bot](https://github.com/loboda4450/inpost-telegram-bot)
